fields.label: Policy Overview
fields.description: Ensures safe and compliant transportation of workers to, from, and within farm operations in line with South African law and WIETA/SIZA standards.

fields.label: Objectives
options: Ensure safe worker transport on and between sites
Comply with National Road Traffic Act and COIDA
Educate workers about transport risks
Maintain roadworthy vehicles

fields.label: Responsibilities
options: Management maintains vehicles and ensures qualified drivers
Workers follow transport safety rules and report issues
Drivers inspect vehicles and comply with safety rules

fields.label: Vehicle Requirements
options: Roadworthy, registered, and licensed vehicles
Safety features including seatbelts and enclosed areas
Minimum enclosure height: 350mm (seated), 900mm (standing)

fields.label: Worker Seating and Boarding
options: Workers must be seated
No sitting on trailer edges
Boarding/disembarking only after full stop

fields.label: Driver Qualifications
options: Valid driverâ€™s license and PDP required
Tractor drivers must be trained
Drivers must understand terrain and hazards

fields.label: External Transport Providers
fields.description: Must comply with COIDA and National Road Traffic regulations for worker transport.

fields.label: Legal Compliance
options: Follow National Road Traffic Act and COIDA
Workers may not protrude from vehicles
Vehicles must be visible in all conditions

fields.label: Safety Rules During Transport
options: Workers sit in designated areas only
Report unsafe transport conditions
Drivers maintain vehicles and follow traffic rules

fields.label: Application and Review
fields.description: Applies to all farm operations and reviewed periodically to align with legislation.
